## ProsemirrorDevTools variable

A component that should be placed within the remirror context and will automatically wrap the prosemirror view and create a lovely dev tools components.

Make sure not to use this in production as it increase the bundle size quite significantly.

Based on https://github.com/d4rkr00t/prosemirror-dev-tools

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
ProsemirrorDevTools: () => null
```
